content: Looks like about 25 approved PRs with rollup potential right now. If someone wants to do a rollup, hopefully that would speed up the PR queue a bunch.
Anyone can make rollups, you can make one if you like :)
But please prefer smaller rollups - maybe 2 or 3 rather than one 25 PRs large, that seems really likely to have something performance related hiding.

Joshua Nelson said:

https://forge.rust-lang.org/release/rollups.html#making-a-rollup

This says (emphasis mine):

Using the interface on Homu queue, select a few pull requests and then use "rollup" button to make one. (The text about fairness can be ignored.)

Maybe we should just remove that text, or modify it?

Joshua Nelson said:

Anyone can make rollups, you can make one if you like :)

But don't they have to have r+ privileges?
No, someone with r+ privileges will need to approve it to get it on the que, but anyone can make one.
